programme.desc: Pups Save an Adventure - While camping, Marshall and the PAW Patrol help Alex learn about Fire Safety!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep204
programme.desc: The Crew Builds Library Treasure Tunnels / The Crew Builds a Super Snack Dispenser - Rubble & Crew's favorite book series has new additions! But when there's no room for them in the library, the pups have to get creative.// The pups have a surprise just for Rubble... a snack dispenser! But will they finish it before Rubble finds out?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep205
programme.desc: The Crew Builds a Hair Salon / The Crew Builds a Colorful Crystal Show - Rubble & Crew build a hair salon just in time for Grandpa Gravel's special photo-until they run into a squirrely shampoo setback! / Motor and Lily make a shiny discovery worth celebrating... with the coolest light show the pups have ever seen!

programme.title: DORA S2 Ep209
programme.desc: Rainforest Race / Bok Bok Birthday - Dora and Boots race their boxcar against Croc Racers in the Rainforest Race. / Dora and Boots secretly hand out Big Red Chicken's birthday invites to all their friends in time for his birthday party.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep124
programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale / Swimming With The Sharks - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure. // Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep203
programme.desc: Going Wild - When Sharkdog's wild side keeps scaring away the dogs at the dog park, Sharkdog must find his inner calm if he wants to make new friends.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep204
programme.desc: A Not So Grand Opening - When Sharkdog accidentally eats the aquarium's newest exhibit, Max and the Sharkpack must come up with a plan before Mr. Ceviche, the aquarium's owner, catches on.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep205
programme.desc: The Fast and The Fishy - Max is determined to win this year's obstacle course race, but that may be difficult with Sharkdog always trying to help.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep314
programme.desc: Princess Peppa - Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep315
programme.desc: Teddy's Playgroup - Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep316
programme.desc: Danny's Pirate Party - It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep317
programme.desc: Mr Potato Comes to Town - All the people in Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports center.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Apple Pie / Guacamole - Tiny Chef bakes apple pie for the big contest, and after an accident, has to think fast to come up with a new entry. // Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Clock and Dance / Barbapileup - The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Relay Tales / The Barbababies' World - Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep518
programme.desc: Video Game Heroes - Blaze and AJ are super excited to play their new video game. But when a video game wizard makes the game come alive, Blaze and AJ must level up and save Axle City from pixel pandemonium

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep519
programme.desc: The Treat Thief - Officer Blaze just got his biggest case yet: tracking down the mischievous Treat Thief! With help from Officer Anna, Blaze sets out to stop the thief and recover every stolen treat!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep921
programme.desc: Pups Save a Flamingo Dancer / Pups Save a Mayor and Her Mini - The Paw Patrol searches for Julia, Julius and a flamingo when they go missing from a dance contest. // The Paw Patrol comes to the rescue when Mayor Goodway and her niece Julia get stuck on a runaway art installation.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep922
programme.desc: Pups Save the Wind Trekkers / Pups Save a Trophy - When Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta get trapped inside a mesa, it's up to the Paw Patrol and a little snake to rescue them. // When Humdinger's mom Helga loses her son's phony trophy, the Paw Patrol have to rescue her and the trophy.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep107
programme.desc: The Show Must Flow On / Detective Baby Shark - When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine. // When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Double Dare You / Roy - On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep315
programme.desc: Paddington's Race Against the Storm / Paddington's Super Snail - Judy finds her inner hero when a storm hits on a Rangers Camping trip, and they need to shelter from the weather // Paddington befriends a speedy snail, who is so fast she has a heroic future ahead, but why does she look so sad?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep104
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Playground / The Crew Fixes A Roof - After Speed Meister builds an unsafe playground, the Rubble & Crew get creative and build a whole new one with old materials. // The town Chili Cookaroo is threatened when City Hall's roof starts to cave in! Luckily, the pups know just how to fix it.

programme.title: DORA S2 Ep204
programme.desc: The Floor Is Guava / We Are The Grumples - Boots wants to enjoy Banana Fest, but the Guava Geyser is erupting! Dora needs to stop the geyser and save the festival. / It's Picture Day, but the Grumpy Old Troll runs away! Dora follows him into Troll World to get him to come out for the picture.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep520
programme.desc: The Race Around the Earth - In their biggest race ever, Blaze and AJ go head-to-head against Crusher to race all the way around the Earth and win the World's Biggest Trophy!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S2 Ep202
programme.desc: Donuts / Rainbow Salad - Chef attempts to bake Olly's favorite donuts for her surprise birthday breakfast without waking her up. // Chef and Olly have their hands full babysitting twelve ladybug babies and trying to make them a snack at the same time.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Sharkdog Sitting - While Max is out Olivia babysits Sharkdog but she just can't keep him inside.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep119
programme.desc: Fish Fiesta Freakout - Everyone's excited for the Foggy Springs carnival, but it's getting more and more difficult to keep Sharkdog a secret.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Sharkdog, Family - When the town discovers Sharkdog, Max needs to convince everyone that he's not a monster.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep122
programme.desc: The Lost Jelly / Coral Dilemma - When a visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby's communication skills are put to the test. // When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep206
programme.desc: Tour Fishies - When Finnegan Travelfins leaves Carnivore Cove out of his travel guide, Baby and William make a video to show off their town!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep924
programme.desc: Pups Save a Jukebox / Pups Save a Mayor on a Wire - Mayor Humdinger steals a jukebox so he can play an annoying song all day long. Chase and Rubble track it down to save the records. // A hungry eagle causes Mayor Goodway's tightrope walking lesson to go awry sending her careening down Jake's Mountain

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep613
programme.desc: Pups Save a Freaky Pup-Day - Chase and Chickaletta switch bodies and must learn to work together to return Cap'n Turbot's boat to the bay.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep210
programme.desc: The Crew And Skye Build A Mountain Lodge - Skye visits Rubble & Crew from Adventure Bay when their construction project needs some aerial support. But when Speed Meister tries to beat the pups to finish the job, Skye, Rubble, and the rest of the crew jump into rescue mode to save the day!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep423
programme.desc: Pottery - Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep311
programme.desc: Polly's Boat Trip - Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep312
programme.desc: Delphine Donkey - Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep313
programme.desc: Fire Engine - When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep158
programme.desc: Go Find it - Today, Christopher organises the game of the day. He lists objects that his friends must bring back, the 1st team who does, win the game. But the objects are not easy to gather: the sun, a rocket ship, or a house!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep159
programme.desc: Ron Stays Over - When Anna and Froga invite Ron to take a nap on their couch, they are surprised by his loud snores. They try everything they can to get him to stop (without disturbing his nap) and when they try to get Bubu's help, but Ron snores louder and louder!!

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep85
programme.desc: I Spy - The voice trumpet leads a game of 'I Spy' where the Teletubbies have to spot different colours - purple, green, yellow and red. What or who can they spot with those colours?

programme.title: Yakka Dee S7 Ep9
programme.desc: I - Dee encourages a friend to say 'i', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We see some insects, use our imagination and get an invitation from an inventor!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Zip's Movie - As everyone else gets their films ready for a big movie night, Zip still doesn't know what his film should be about. He wonders whether he will have a film to show at movie night after all.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Float or Sink - Captain Messy plays pirates with his toys in a bowl of water, but why does his rubber duck float instead of sink?

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Unicorse - Bluey can't get to sleep, so Mum reads her one last story. But they are interrupted by Unicorse, the most annoying hand puppet in the world, whom Bluey tries to reform.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Curry Quest - Bingo and Dad must brave a swooping magpie protecting its nest, when they go on a curry swap to Mackenzie's house through the park.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep32
programme.desc: The Voice Badge - Duggee explains why animals all have different voices.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep31
programme.desc: The Stick Badge - Duggee and the squirrels prepare for a campfire by collecting sticks of all sizes.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep30
programme.desc: The Colour Badge - Duggee is painting in his favourite colouring book. The Squirrels want to have a go too.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep44
programme.desc: Whistler Mountain, Canada - The Go Jetters are on Whistler Mountain in Canada doing some skiing and checking out the amazing cable car which runs high up between the mountains.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep43
programme.desc: Bird Migration: Spain & Africa - In this aerial adventure the Go Jetters are on the Strait of Gibraltar, Southern Spain to follow a group of migrating baby stalks as they make their journey from Spain to Africa.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep51
programme.desc: Christmas Swim - The Heelers gather for a classic Aussie Christmas. Bluey gets a new teddy and introduces him to the whole family, but the family play too rough with him and now he wants to go home.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep50
programme.desc: Grandad - Grandad is supposed to be resting, but when Bluey and Bingo go to visit him, he makes a run for it with the kids and takes them on a madcap adventure into the bush.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Andy and the Bowerbird - Andy heads to the jungles of Papua New Guinea and meets a Bowerbird building its nest.

programme.title: Ranger Hamza's Eco Quest S2 Ep19
programme.desc: Wild Flower Meadow - Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers go on an eco quest to find out all about wild flower meadows.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep25
programme.desc: Sandy and Seaweed's Super Snippets - Squawk takes us on a journey to find Sandy and Seaweed's top Swashbuckle moments, their super snippets, which are all hidden along a pirate treasure map.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep27
programme.desc: The Ball Badge - The Squirrels are confused when they see Duggee sitting on a ball because they all have their own favourite way of using it, whether it be kicking, throwing or catching.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep26
programme.desc: The Commuting Badge - Norrie is running late to Squirrel Club, so Duggee teaches the squirrels what a commute is - a journey that can take you from home to learn, work or play.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep25
programme.desc: The Wisdom Badge - The Squirrels see Duggee reading about wise animals and wish to learn more about what it means to be wise.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep27
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Compass Navigators - Can Kyan and Foz use new compass skills to navigate their way out of an academy maze?

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep26
programme.desc: Nomads, Mongolia - Glitch offends some nomads in Mongolia, so it's down to the Go Jetters to take the reins.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep12
programme.desc: Thomas and the Inventor's Workshop - Thomas is asked to help find the inventor, Ruth, a new home and workshop on Sodor.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep38
programme.desc: The Art of Pink - The art gallery is holding a celebration of the colour pink and Sarah is keen to take part.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Pond Prose - Sarah is inspired by listening to a poetry record and decides to make up some poetry of her own.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Holiday - Seamus has booked the wrong date for his and Little Woo's holiday. Stanley repurposes the locations of the town into activities and sights to give them a holiday in a day.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Dog Loves Yeti - Dog and Pug are trying to solve one of the world's great mysteries, and they meet Granny Pug trying to track down the Yeti.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep68
programme.desc: Pretend Piggy - Monty is told off when he behaves like a pig, literally, and decides to roll in the mud. This makes him think about why people can't act like animals.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep27
programme.desc: It's Time to go Beach Combing - When JoJo and Gran Gran visit the beach, JoJo is surprised to find the sea is much further away as the tide is out. Together, they see what interesting things they can find.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Born Yesterday - Dad pretends he was born yesterday. Bluey and Bingo have to guide him through his second day on Earth, especially when he discovers food is delicious and steals Lucky's Dad's pie.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Mini Bluey - When Dad complains about how dissimilar Bluey and Bingo are, Bluey hatches a plan to make them more alike and happily introduces Mini-Bluey!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Unicorse - Bluey can't get to sleep, so Mum reads her one last story. But they are interrupted by Unicorse, the most annoying hand puppet in the world, whom Bluey tries to reform.

programme.desc: The Transport Badge - When Duggee's old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep2
programme.desc: The Face Painting Badge - The Squirrels are looking for Duggee but can't find him. Instead, they find someone who looks like Enid, only much too big. Duggee has painted his face to look like Enid!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep44
programme.desc: Whistler Mountain, Canada - The Go Jetters are on Whistler Mountain in Canada doing some skiing and checking out the amazing cable car which runs high up between the mountains.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep43
programme.desc: Bird Migration: Spain & Africa - In this aerial adventure the Go Jetters are on the Strait of Gibraltar, Southern Spain to follow a group of migrating baby stalks as they make their journey from Spain to Africa.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep51
programme.desc: Christmas Swim - The Heelers gather for a classic Aussie Christmas. Bluey gets a new teddy and introduces him to the whole family, but the family play too rough with him and now he wants to go home.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep50
programme.desc: Grandad - Grandad is supposed to be resting, but when Bluey and Bingo go to visit him, he makes a run for it with the kids and takes them on a madcap adventure into the bush.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Andy and the Bowerbird - Andy heads to the jungles of Papua New Guinea and meets a Bowerbird building its nest.

programme.title: Ranger Hamza's Eco Quest S2 Ep19

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep25

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep27
programme.desc: The Ball Badge - The Squirrels are confused when they see Duggee sitting on a ball because they all have their own favourite way of using it, whether it be kicking, throwing or catching.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep26
programme.desc: The Commuting Badge - Norrie is running late to Squirrel Club, so Duggee teaches the squirrels what a commute is - a journey that can take you from home to learn, work or play.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep25
programme.desc: The Wisdom Badge - The Squirrels see Duggee reading about wise animals and wish to learn more about what it means to be wise.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep27

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep26

programme.desc: How democracy can fail: Lessons from Germany - Democracies can fail. programme.title: UFC 312: Du Plessis vs. Strickland 2
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC returns down under to Sydney, Australia on February 9, and all eyes will be on Qudos Bank Arena when middleweight champion Dricus Du Plessis defends his crown against the man he took it from, Sean Strickland, in the main event of UFC 312. The first time this pair met last January, it was one of the best fights of 2024 as Du Plessis defeated Strickland by a narrow split decision. Now theyll run it back in Sydney. Plus, dominant strawweight champion Zhang Weili will put her belt on the line against unbeaten Tatiana Suarez in a highly anticipated title fight.
